kulami.game.player

Interface KulamiStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MinimaxStrategy, RandomStrategy

    public interface KulamiStrategy
    A CompPlayer uses an object of a class that implements the KulamiStrategy interface to make moves.
    Author:
    gordon

      Choose a position for the next move.
